snippet: Gov. Jay Nixon ordered the curfew as protests continued over the police shooting of an unarmed black teenager, Michael Brown, and after incidents of looting Friday night.
abstract: Missouri Gov Jay Nixon imposes midnight to 5 am curfew in Ferguson, Mo, declaring a state of emergency as violence flares anew after a week of street protests over killing of Michael Brown; announcement prompts some members of the public to argue that curfew will lead to new and fierce confrontations.

byline.original: By JULIE BOSMAN and ALAN BLINDER
byline.contributor: Emma G. Fitzsimmons contributed reporting from New York, and Charlie Savage from Washington.

lead_paragraph: Gov. Jay Nixon ordered the curfew as protests continued over the police shooting of an unarmed black teenager, Michael Brown, and after incidents of looting Friday night.

headline.main: Midnight Curfew in Effect for Ferguson
headline.print_headline: Missouri Orders Nightly Curfew to Quell Looting
